attributes.action: Stop cycle races around Surrey areas and make all cyclist use the cycle path
attributes.background: Don't you find it annoying they shut all roads to hold the races in the area cant get out of your house or in also your behind them and there is a cycle path next to you there not using

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
